creator: ecapachedev@gmail.com
text:
When logging is in TRACE mode or lower,
org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoader.findClass(String) calls
getClassLoader() without a privileged block.  With security enabled, this will
cause a SecurityException if the RuntimePermission to getClassLoader is not granted.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: I have committed a patch to trunk and proposed the fix for 5.5.x and 6.0.x

creator: markt@apache.org
text: This has been fixed in 6.0.x and will be included in 6.0.17 onwards.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: This has been fixed in 5.5.x and will be included in 5.5.27 onwards.
